title: Welcome to the Berque Fund
text:
Welcome to the Dave Berque Fund website. This fund supports scholarships for Computer Science students in honor of Dave Berque.







Initial Steps:

Create a Scholarship Fund: We will start by creating a scholarship fund through DePauw.
Seed the Fund: Our target is to raise approximately $150,000 with pledges over the next 12 months. Donations can be made this year and/or next year.
Utilize company matching programs to maximize contributions.
Multi-year gift pledges are not feasible at this stage, as we need to complete this within the first year.
Future Possibilities:

Broader Outreach: Once we have pledges from our group, we will reach out to other alumni through broader email campaigns and targeted 1:1s.
Potential Expansion: Depending on the success of our initial fundraising, we may consider setting a higher target (e.g., a $2 million endowed chair). This would involve more support from DePauw and coordination with their larger capital campaign. At this point, larger, multi-year pledges can be discussed.

title: About Dave Berque
text:
Dave Berque is a distinguished figure in the field of computer science education, known for his innovative teaching methodologies and expertise in human-computer interaction (HCI). He dedicates himself to shaping the next generation of technologists through his role as an educator, imparting knowledge and inspiring countless students. Beyond the classroom, Dave Berque’s impact is evident in the ongoing efforts of his former students to establish a scholarship or endowment in his honor. His legacy continues to resonate through his significant contributions to both academia and the broader community of technology education.
